rms.dao

Class GuestsJdbcTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • rms.dao.GuestsJdbcTemplate

  • public class GuestsJdbcTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
    Java Database Connectivity Template that utilizes Spring Framework to manage Guests through a database connection. This class contains methods for inserting, deleting, updating from the Guests table. Other methods include searching for a specific Guest based on a Booking ID and also showing all Guests.
    Author:
    Re: Syntellions

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public int insert(Guests guest)
        Method to insert a new row into the Guests table
        Parameters:
        guest - A java object containing all the Guest data you want to be inserted into the database.
        Returns:
        The number of rows inserted. (Either 0 or 1)

      • delete

        public int delete(int bookingId)
        Method to delete a row from the Guests table.
        Parameters:
        bookingId - the ID (primary key) of the row to be deleted.
        Returns:
        The number of deleted rows. (Either 0 or 1)

      • update

        public int update(Guests guest)
        Method to update a row from the Guests table
        Parameters:
        guest - The java object containing all the new values to be updated. Will update the row with the same ID as the java object. ID is based on both Booking ID and User ID.
        Returns:
        The number of rows updated (Either 0 or 1)

      • search

        public java.util.List<Guests> search(int bookingId)
                              throws org.springframework.dao.EmptyResultDataAccessException,
                                     org.springframework.dao.IncorrectResultSizeDataAccessException
        Will search for a database row and map it into a java object.
        Parameters:
        bookingId - The ID of the row you want to search for.
        Returns:
        The mapped java object containing all the data from the database row.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.EmptyResultDataAccessException - exception for returning a result set that does not exist
        org.springframework.dao.IncorrectResultSizeDataAccessException - exception for returning a result set that is the incorrect size

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Guests> getAll()
        Get a list of all the database rows from the Guests table.
        Returns:
        A list of all the rows in the Guests table mapped to java objects
